ValidationRule.description: The quantity entered must be at least 100 for Lawyer Meter Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (TEXT(Meter_Type__c) ="Lawyers"), License_Product__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Product__r.Product_Group__c, "Ops Only - Do Not Use")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Product__r.Product_Group__c, "Legacy OnePlace licenses")), SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "EX-01542", SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "BU-00989", SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "TM-01544", SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "PR-01543", SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "IN-01465", SBQQ__Product__r.Item_Master_Product__r.Intapp_Item_Master_Number__c != "CO-01466", SBQQ__Quantity__c<100, TEXT(SBQQ__Quote__r.SBQQ__Type__c) <> "Amendment", $Profile.Name<>"Standard User - Sales Operations", $User.Id <> "00550000002q64G" /*Jennifer Richard*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The quantity entered must be at least 100 for Lawyer Meter Type.
